title: Cleveland President of Basketball Operations Koby Altman
description:
Cavaliers president of basketball operations Koby Altman joins The Woj Pod to discuss All-Star Weekend in Cleveland, the franchise's road back to Eastern Conference contention, deal-making in a rebuild, JB Bickerstaff, decisions around LeBron James and Kyrie Irving, what he learned about making NBA deals working in real estate and much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Adrian Wojnarowski
